DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess bioavailability Primidone 50 mg tablet Dr.Reddy 's compare Mysoline @ tablet Yamanouchi Pharma Technologies Inc , healthy , adult , human subject fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Primidone Tablets 50 mg Dr. Reddy 's Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: An open label , balance . randomize , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , single dose , crossover , bioequivalence study Primidone 50 mg tablet Dr.Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , Generics , India compare Mysoline ( contain Primidone 50 mg ) tablets Yamanouchi Pharma Technologies Inc , Norman , OK healthy , adult , human subject fast condition washout period 14 day .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must fulfill follow criterion consider inclusion study : 1 . Subjects provide write informed consent . 2 . Subjects must healthy , adult , human being within 1845 year age ( inclusive ) weigh least 50 kg . 3 . Having Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 24.9 ( inclusive ) , calculate weight Kg/height m2 4 . Subjects must normal health determine medical history physical examination perform within 21 day prior commencement study . 5 . Subjects whose screen laboratory value within normal limit consider physician/investigator clinical significance . 6 . Availability subject entire study period willingness adhere protocol requirement evidence write informed consent . The subject exclude base follow criterion screen study 1 . Subjects incapable understanding informed consent . 2 . Subjects : 1 . Systolic blood pressure le 90 mm ofHg 140 mm Hg 2 . Diastolic blood pressure le 60 mm Hg 94 mm Hg . Minor deviation ( 24 mm Hg ) checkin may acceptable discretion physician/investigator . 3 . Pulse rate 50/min 100/min . 3 . History hypersensitivity idiosyncratic reaction study drug relate drug . 4 . Any evidence impairment renal , hepatic , cardiac , lung gastrointestinal function . 5 . Consumption grapefruit past ten day prior dose day completion study . 6 . Regular smoker habit smoke nine cigarette per day difficulty abstain smoke 48 hour dose sampling period . 7 . Subjects take counter prescribed medication enzyme modify systemic medication last 7 30 day respectively dose . 8 . Subjects participate clinical investigation use experimental drug/donated blood past 90 day date start study . 9 . Subjects clinically significant abnormality ( Laboratory Findings , ECG , XRay , Drugs abuse , Alcohol etc. , ) and/or significant disease ( HIV , Hey , Syphilis , Hepatitis B etc. , ) . 10 .
